import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function MatchLine(props) { const matchData = props.matchData console.log(matchData) let dateString = matchData?.time const dateObject = new Date(dateString); const formattedTime = dateObject.toLocaleTimeString("en-US", { hour: "numeric", minute: "numeric", hour12: true }); return (
{matchData.status.finished ?? {formattedTime} }
{matchData.home.name}
{matchData.away.name}
{/*
Full Time
*/}
) } export default MatchLine
